mean_cn: n.杂种；混血儿；混合物；  adj.混合的；杂种的
mean_en: an animal or plant that has parents of different species or varieties; something that is the product of mixing two or more different things; a vehicle that uses two different types of power, especially petrol/gas or diesel and electricity
sentence: A mule is a hybrid between a horse and a donkey.
sentence_trans: 骡子是马和驴的杂交后代。
